questions.question: In which year did World War I begin?
questions.explanation: World War I began in 1914 after the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand.

questions.question: The fall of the Berlin Wall occurred in ___
questions.explanation: The Berlin Wall fell on November 9, 1989, symbolizing the end of the Cold War.

questions.question: The Renaissance began in Italy.
questions.explanation: The Renaissance started in Italy in the 14th century and spread throughout Europe.
